text: If blacks are African-American aren't whites European-Americans? I am definitely a Euro-Am. My mother was born in Prague and my father in Bucharest. I was born in Brooklyn, raised in Queens (Jackson Heights and Flushing). I heard on the radio the other day that Queens has a larger population than 15 of the US states. That puts things in perspective. They sure make a lot of noise for such a bunch of punkasses.
